Package view

Interface UIStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConsoleInterface, View
public interface UIStrategy
Defines a strategy for displaying output to the user. An output strategy must be able to display the board and also be able to display PrintStream messages to the user.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void displayLegalMoves​(Model game)
    Display the legal moves for the turn player.
    java.io.PrintStream getPrintStream()  
    void initBoard​(Board board)
    Displays the board.
    void updateBoard​(Board board, Position placedPiece, java.util.LinkedList<Tile> flippedPieces)
    Updates the board according to the piece played.

  • Method Details

    • initBoard

      void initBoard​(Board board)
      Displays the board.
      Parameters:
      board - The board.

    • updateBoard

      void updateBoard​(Board board, Position placedPiece, java.util.LinkedList<Tile> flippedPieces)
      Updates the board according to the piece played. This method does not change the state of the board, it merely displays changes that were made.
      Parameters:
      board - The board
      placedPiece - The position of the piece that was just played
      flippedPieces - The pieces that were flipped during this turn.

    • displayLegalMoves

      void displayLegalMoves​(Model game)
      Display the legal moves for the turn player.
      Parameters:
      game - The game state

    • getPrintStream

      java.io.PrintStream getPrintStream()
      Returns:
      The PrintStream used to send messages to.
